We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private LinearWeightedMovingAverage _lwma;
// In Initialize()
_lwma = LWMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_lwma.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Period", _lwma.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Current", _lwma.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.lwma = self.LWMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.lwma.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Period", self.lwma.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Current", self.lwma.Current);
